lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I want to help ordinary people improve their lives. They need capital to move foreward.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell commodities like oil, grains and meat.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I believe that alleviating poverty will make our world a better place. I am a supporter of micro-credit, because it has proven itself to be a very effective way tool to alleviate poverty.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: I can and I will as much as I can. This is such an amazing idea - and so amazingly simple!
lender.occupational_info: Higher Education.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: Manage Real Estate Agents, who help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate that I can...and I will until I can't.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher who writes everyday on plays, short stories and, of course, THE novel I've been working on all my life.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I am encouraged to think that by making even a small loan that I am able to help someone else advance themselves financially and improve their lot in life.
lender.occupational_info: Before retirement I was in educational administration. I worked for a private high school north of San Francisco, California.

lender.name: Jeremy & Betsy
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with many great opportunities and wish to share those with others. Also Jesus says to share.

lender.name: Jerrmy
lender.loan_because: Giving is Good
lender.occupational_info: I cook delicious and healthy food for the good people of my city. I am very thankful to operate my own restaurant and to be an successful entrepreneur.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: every little bit counts.

lender.name: Frank Davies
lender.loan_because: I own a small business and know how difficult it is to start a business, or finance an expansion . I hope that these small loans will help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We print for large and small companies. We print on T-shirts, mugs key chains banners of all colors including vinyl banners and full color large size banners, and much more. We also do embroidery and digital printing.

lender.name: Tiffany Michele
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much that I don't deserve and I want to be a blessing to someone else. Jesus said in Mathew 25:40, “Truly I tell you, just as you did it to one of the least of these who are members of my family, you did it to me.”
lender.occupational_info: I watch God's precious gifts, three year olds with lots of energy! I also am a youth worker at my church and get the privledge of spending my time with high school and jr highers. :)

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I make web sites.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I wear many hats on my job, but most of the time I mediate differences and help people that can't, aren't willing or don"t know how to help themselves.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that everyone on Earth should have a home, enjoyable livelihood, health care, nutritious food and enough wealth to ensure their children's security. May you all be blessed 1,000 times!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of elders who are losing their memory and people of all ages with mental illness.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: we are all God's children

lender.name: carl
lender.loan_because: the joy of helping my fellow man improve their situation
lender.occupational_info: examine peoples eyes

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and I like to help others.

lender.name: Makoto
lender.occupational_info: Marine Corps Helicopter Pilot

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving people the opportunity to make a living doing what they want to do.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about empowering women and am thankful for the opportunity to be able do so much with so little. Kiva is creating a smaller world where needs are more visible and are here- so easily met.
lender.occupational_info: I would like to support other women in maintaining and growing their businesses.

lender.name: Connor
lender.loan_because: It helps!
lender.occupational_info: I help teach children and adults how to effectively transform conflicts.

lender.name: extramsg
lender.loan_because: It's better to teach a man to fish than to give a man a fish.
lender.occupational_info: I feed people.

lender.name: Steffen og Eldrid, Mats, Eirik og Aksel
Tim
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in many ways and this is how my family and I are saying thank you. Hopefully God will be in your heart and you will do the same one day.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning to be an electrician in a 5 year hands on apprenticeship program. I'm currently in my second year of training.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It's good to help others get ahead when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect wetlands from irresponsible development.

lender.name: Jef
lender.occupational_info: I use design as a tool to solve problems.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I've seen the impact that a small amount of money can have in a developing country. If I can't be there physically to help out, I might as well help out financially.

lender.name: Ravima
lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me and I should share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help those in trouble to minimise their distress.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain the same kind of technology that gets this website to you =0).

lender.name: Joyce Hellmann
lender.loan_because: I want to help others prosper and, in turn, be able to help others.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I want to make the better place and believe I can help people make the small step of ownership.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Olya
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live in a developed country of endless opportunities. People all over the world have the motivation to work and to create businesses but very few have the financial ability to do so. I am happy to be a small part of their success as a loaner on Kiva.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: they deserve it.
lender.occupational_info: enlightening

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want the small amount of money that I CAN loan to actually make a difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: i like to see people succeed in their ventures
lender.occupational_info: i'm a car guy so this is a fun occupation were i work with like minded people.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I believe in other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student at UT Austin.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help developing countries and their entrepreneurs succeed at their goals! If we all help just a little we can make a little go a long way!!

lender.name: ekowalc
lender.loan_because:
We were given loans in college, albeit on credit cards at excruciating rates. Nonetheless, capital was available to us. The idea of giving capital directly to an entrepreneur willing to do what is needed to succeed, and avoiding "management" and other fees associated with charities is what appeals the most about Kiva.
We are glad to help give opportunities to hard working entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We had the opportunity to make millions of individuals laugh and feel good about life. Hopefully that will continue.

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting sustainable economic development throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write music and software, but usually not at the same time.

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship should be facilitated and encouraged everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I make computer software that helps people work more efficiently.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that we have an obligation to help if we can. And this hardly hurts me at all. Almost everyone in Canada should be able to make at least a $25 loan. Imagine.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kindergarten children who have language impairments. In my spare time I am a visual artist.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: This is a way for people to connect in profound ways.
lender.occupational_info: Multimedia artist

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it helps someone who needs the money more than I do.

lender.name: Jason Kirk
lender.loan_because: I believe in free markets.
lender.occupational_info: I write, and I make websites.

lender.name: Crsitina E. Martinez
lender.loan_because: I care enough to help someone change their life & It helps others get out of poverty and be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed

lender.name: Ken & Sahida
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together!

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: it's nice to help people.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to give, and am glad to find a way to ensure a charitable contribution goes straight to the hands of the people who really need it.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.occupational_info: I work for doctors (radiologists), if they can make a difference in people's lives, why can't I?

lender.name: Pamela & Jon
lender.loan_because: We can! We aren't billionaires but we have enough to share - we want to help create work that supports their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Jon works with a computer networking company to keep toxic substances out of their products. Pamela is an internet entrepreneur trying to change the world.

lender.name: Chester
lender.loan_because: I know microlending is one of the best ways to level the global market playing field.

lender.occupational_info: I walk with people on their spiritual Spiritual journey.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I believe that people will work hard to improve their lives if they have an opportunity.

lender.loan_because: I believe that you can change the world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I make a living as a writer talking about movies and entertainment.

lender.name: Megha
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea that allows people to borrow and lend money for the purpose of personal/family growth and success.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I'm able to
lender.occupational_info: i teach 7 and 8 year olds

lender.loan_because: I think this is a great program and I have been blessed in my life. I think we all need to give back and help those that need it.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: micro finance rocks!

lender.name: Jolanda
lender.occupational_info: I work for a publisher of Christian education and worship resources. My role is to coordinate training for Sunday school coordinators and teachers.

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I bring the best out of people towards a goal and ensure they are recognized & respected for their contributions.

lender.name: Admiral
lender.occupational_info: I explore strange new worlds, seek out new lifeforms and new civilizations, all while boldly going where no one has gone before.

lender.name: Roseita
lender.loan_because: it makes dreams come true around the world :)

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to make money off the interest. Yes, I know it's a 0% rate. I'm going to make it up in volume.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to support people around the world. I think it is amazing to help someone that you never met. I loan because I want to make a difference in a life, if only for a moment.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student. I go to school full time. I work at night. I am studing to become an Elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Kait
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in college studying Psychology.

lender.loan_because: i would like to loan because i want to start a business that will make my life better and i can able send me children to go to school.,
lender.occupational_info: very poor

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping to provide others with the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I love capitalism and think that the best way to make a difference in the world is to allow people the opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I install steel, copper, and zinc roofing systems.

lender.name: Emory MicroCredit Club
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students, alumni and faculty committed to alleviating poverty through microcredit. We believe in Kiva's mission and want to do everything we can to help.

lender.name: Annelise
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit is quite possibly the most amazing thing I have ever heard of.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying Global Health and Latin American Studies and I love it completely.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea. I wish I would have thought of it first.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a nurse.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: Keeping a little of my money in circulation to make other peoples lives better makes my life better.
lender.occupational_info: I distribute the work my company gets to our freelance workforce of about 150 people. I try to give each worker the number of hours they need each week at the times that suit them best.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have been a business owner for most of my career and understand how hard it can be. I want to help others get their own business operational.
lender.occupational_info: I own a web hosting company. We provide web site services to customers of all sizes.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: The best way to help people is to give them the opportunity to help themselves. This is how we build a better world!
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am traveling to Japan to teach English.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: I believe helping women provide for their families and educate their kids can get people out of poverty and change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are homeless and mentally ill, to help them get a place to live, medical care, and whatever else they need that I can help with.

lender.name: Kingfisher
lender.loan_because: we believe that everyone should have the opportunities we have.
lender.occupational_info: We are two partners in a small company that finds opportunities to make people's lives better.

lender.name: marty
lender.loan_because: helping people to help themselves will always produce better outcomes than just giving money away.
lender.occupational_info: Crewing an Ambulance, and also teaching people to work safely.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I admire those willing to work hard to better themselves. Hopefully these small loans will bring them a step closer to their goals.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Small amounts of money can add up to a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I ship things, but my company doesn't own them. We just help to forward them.

lender.name: Xabier
lender.loan_because: Others who should doesn't.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I was once loaned money at a critical time in my life, and I would not be here today without it.
lender.occupational_info: I protect people

lender.name: Katiethedreamqueen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of dreams, and the impact small heartfelt contributions make to each of us.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, writer and have a jewellery business that i am trying to get off the ground with the purest intent.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I don't have that much money to spare, and I feel like this is a really efficient way to get the most good out of what I do have.

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people out of poverty, realizing their dreams and live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I sell wine & spirits.

lender.name: Marius
lender.loan_because: Spread Kiva love!

lender.name: Rokuban
lender.loan_because: Poker money can be put to good use.
lender.occupational_info: HR consultant & university teacher, I am also an amateur middle stakes poker player with moderate success.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Having a positive impact is very rewarding. Kiva is a way to directly help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pilot for a USA based airline

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I have seen the difference made to helping people in developing countries educate and help themselves. Its what we are each called to do, help our neighbours.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Advocate with Compassion the global child sponsorship organisation speaking up for those who cannot speak for themselves.

lender.name: Alessandro
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the implementation of new software.

lender.name: Eanna
lender.loan_because: I want to help build a self-sufficient entrepreneurial spirit in the people of developing countries, so they can take control of their own living standards.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve business problems by designing and building software they use to run their business.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to children in Japan

lender.name: Ricky
lender.loan_because: I place my Faith in the good of people and seeing people do good for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I've working more jobs than I can count but for the last 15 years or so. I've cared for people who had a hard time attaining there goals. I've cooked in a small cafe for 13 years and I also tend bar at a local pub.

lender.loan_because: I believe in this model and I want to give back.

lender.name: Jason

lender.occupational_info: I snooze in front of a computer, occasionally rising from my slumber to check reddit

lender.name: Thomas

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: To give someone who's trying to get ahead a little boost.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I want to support my brothers and sisters in our global family.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop science books that children use in schools.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want people to be able to have the chance to be successful. I have the ability to enable that and I am going to take advantage my blessings and share!
lender.occupational_info: My work is about loving. When I get a client to cut their hair my job is to care about their needs. It goes beyond just a hair cut its a relationship formed with that person.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: Understanding and support from others has helped me greatly in achieving my goals.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying to be an aerospace engineer. My goal is to get my PhD so I can teach engineering to college students. My research interest is jet engines.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my good life
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I know that if we are to evolve as a civilization, we will need to ensure those with very little have an opportunity to enrich and improve their own lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mechanic for computers.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I know how fullfilling it is to own and operate your own successful business. Everyone in the world should have that opportunity.

lender.name: Youth Faith Exploration
lender.loan_because: We want to contribute to a better world even with a small amount. And that small amount can change the entire world for one person.
lender.occupational_info: Youth Faith Exploration is a youth group created to motivate and educate youngsters to deepen their faith.

lender.name: Nancy Strom Miller
lender.loan_because: It's an easy and fun way to help people!

lender.name: green-vinyl.com
lender.loan_because: I'd like to offer opportunities to people in poor countries.
lender.occupational_info: I'm running online recordstore green-vinyl.com, buying and selling both new and used music to DJ's and collectors worldwide.

lender.name: Elia M
lender.loan_because: charity is not the solution
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service for hotels

lender.name: DCSNOVA.COM
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to live in a wealthy country with many opportunities often overlooking all that we have been given. We want to pass on the good fortune with which God has blessed us.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a recovery ministry for those struggling to break free from addictions and destructive behaviors. My wife and I also own a cleaning company, specializing in cleaning churches.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupational_info: I go to school every day.

lender.name: MVMS Student Council
lender.loan_because: As student leaders we want to model public service and charitable activities for the students of our school as well as the members of our community.
lender.occupational_info: Charitable service and donations provided by the student leaders of Monte Vista Middle School.

lender.name: chrissy
lender.loan_because: If we all help a little we can make a huge impact.
lender.occupational_info: Smiling, laughing, pouring wine, chatting up the Napa Valley at fume Bistro & Bar!

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I care about God's Earth and the people he created.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Evangelist Pastor in Las Vegas. I want everyone to know the great Healer Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Friðrik Dýrfjörð
lender.loan_because:
Humans hate
To be alone, poor, and hungry.
Yet kings and princes
Use these words as titles.
We gain by losing,
Losing by gaining.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: LaCasita
lender.loan_because: I care about others. My main focus is not profit, it is people.
lender.occupational_info: We care for (and educate) young children in the community while their parents are away earning money for their families.

lender.name: Infusionsoft
lender.loan_because: We and our entrepreneurial customers want to give back and help fellow entrepreneurs be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Our purpose is to liberate and empower entrepreneurs so they can enjoy doing business, wow their customers, and better serve their families and communities.

lender.name: rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people find their independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am a problem solver and organizer

lender.name: freezze
lender.loan_because: In the last few years all online casinos have added a number video slot machines with advanced graphics, game play, and functions. The free slots games seem to be extremely popular amongst online slots players.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school as a technology specialist. I help troubleshoot computers, maintain databases, graphic design. I also am a freelance photographer.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: My money goes much further this way. I grew tired of donating to non-profits that then spend all that money to solicit more money from me.

lender.name: Zeb
lender.loan_because:
Christ the King will say to the people on his right, "Come, my Father has given you his blessing. Receive the kingdom God has prepared for you since the world was made.
"I was hungry, and you gave me food. I was thirsty, and you gave me something to drink. I was alone and away from home, and you invited me into your house.
"I was without clothes, and you gave me something to wear. I was sick, and you cared for me. I was in prison, and you visited me."
--from The Gospel according to Matthew, chapter 25, verses 34 through 46.
lender.occupational_info: Because of the glorious inheritance I have been promised as a child of the one true God, Jehovah Jireh, the true Provider, I am compelled through love to "make disciples of all the nations." The grace and hope that I received is too precious to keep to myself; it must be shared with others who can be taught to share it again with another generation of disciples in Christ Jesus.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: Small business is what makes the world go round. Glad to help those who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use the U.S. Tax code to their advantage. Once you understand the rules you can reduce your taxes from 31% on average to 10% or less.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I love the concept! Using the power of an individuals resources to help empower those in less fortunate nations to be successful.. What a great Idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the semiconductor industry..

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I'd love to own my own business one day - I'd love to help other people do just that in the meantime.

lender.name: Irena
lender.loan_because: women in 3rd world countries need to be supported financially because they are the backbone of every community.......banks don't/won't do it !
lender.occupational_info: after 30 years in policing, i now spend my time volunteering in the community focusing my efforts on helping women and those in need

lender.name: Ben Truscello
lender.occupation: CTO & Co-Founder at The Global Resource Initiative
lender.loan_because: it may be my only legacy.
lender.occupational_info:
I am the chief technology officer and co-founder at the Global Resource Initiative (TGRI), a 501c(3) nonprofit organization seeking to improve the productivity and livelihoods of people in the developing world through access to information, expertise and technology.
Agricultural resources and animals, specifically, are the base of many developing and underdeveloped region’s economies and the life-blood of families, cultures and communities. Poor farmers can benefit when information and knowledge is shared locally. They also benefit when given access to global expertise on agriculture and animal health. TGRI is focused on helping to make these connections locally and globally.

lender.name: A Reason for Chocolate
lender.loan_because: We loan money to effect change in the global community and support and encourage organizations that are working towards making the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: We are a private school (Armitage Academy) and own a candy company (A Reason for Chocolate). Fifty percent of our candy profit enables our students to engage in service activities and support organizations who are helping others.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help, even if it is in just a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a builder with software. I "build" large business phone systems for every aspect of telephone use from what happens when you pick up the phone and dial to how it is routed out when you finish dialing.

lender.name: Tonya & Steve
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to have had people help us in the past and now we intend to "pay it forward". We have faith that people who have been helped, will help others in return. We are all in this together. Namasté
lender.occupational_info: Tonya is a Realtor who helps people buy and sell homes in Arizona. Steve is a designer and project manager contractor, who helps people to remodel their houses. Also visit: www.BeautifulRemodel.com

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe people find dignity in work.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to give back, anyone with the drive and ambition to succeed should not be held back because of money.
lender.occupational_info: I work with maintaining computer systems and supporting their users.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I am Christian.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and I believe that micro-finance is a good way to do that because it helps people to build their local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying philosophy and public policy, but when I am done with school I hope to start a non-profit that will help people in developing countries.

lender.name: tito
lender.loan_because: Kiva is one of the most sustainable organizations.
lender.occupational_info: Leaning about building ...innovative, sustainable and collaborative infrastructure like Architecture for Humanity.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people!

lender.loan_because: Because economic freedom is political freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I am about to be laid off from my job at a magazine. I also write fiction stories

lender.name: Cosmo Miller
lender.loan_because: If loaning $$$ to disadvantaged entrepreneurs is wrong then I don't want to be right!!!

lender.occupational_info: I work for a large UK telecoms company designing and developing websites.

lender.name: sugus couple
lender.loan_because: wanna do our bit

lender.name: Hadi
lender.loan_because: Human beings are members of a whole, In creation of one essence and soul. If one member is afflicted with pain, Other members uneasy will remain. If you have no sympathy for human pain, The name of human you cannot retain. (poem by Sa'di)
lender.occupational_info: I am biomedical science student interested in understanding how our body works, why we get disease, and how we can treat it.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I think it is so simple and so cool!
lender.occupational_info: I work with old building when I 'm not being a mom.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.occupational_info: clinical therapist and pastor

lender.name: Torben
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make something out of their lives.

lender.name: MarketingResults
lender.loan_because: we support business ownership as a sustainable, long-term solution to poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We help Australian businesses make their websites as functional and profitable as possible.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can do directly, something very small to change the world. I believe that trade on equal terms is the way not aid.

lender.name: Pasha
lender.loan_because: I want people to live in a life that we do

lender.name: Geoff
lender.occupation: student studying development and the environment
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: I represent the injured

lender.name: Galena
lender.loan_because: I, too, once needed a helping hand to make my life better. Kiva has given me the opportunity to be that hand for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: The mill where I work turns wood chips into pulp, which is processed further to become products such as paper, food containers, boxes, toilet tissue, disposable baby diapers, etc. I have always believed that everyone, man or woman, rich or poor, young or old, educated or illiterate, has something worthwhile to contribute to the community in which they live. Some have trouble recognizing their worth and others are unaware of how to share it. Kiva and its lenders give entrepreneurs the ability to improve their own lives, which ultimately enriches their community as well.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to be the change I wish to see in the world.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to change the world in "small ways with great love" as Mother Teresa would say.

lender.name: Steff
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: sarika
lender.loan_because: my husband is died in a accident my father in law and mother in law is on dialsis .i have 2 sister in law i have to married them.
lender.occupational_info: i am running a medical store in india

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometimes!
lender.occupational_info: I do legal research for a big law firm in Los Angeles. I also write books on the side and volunteer with an animal rescue group.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it's thrilling to see how microfinance can make a difference and gratifying that my loans can be "recycled."
lender.occupational_info: I've retired from practicing law and now write fiction and screenplays.

lender.name: Maria Pia
lender.loan_because: Creo que si puedo ayudar a una persona a realizar su sueño, estoy realizando el mio propio.
lender.occupational_info: Diseño páginas Web

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: others less fortunate than us need our help.

lender.name: brad
lender.loan_because: all I have is God's first.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor of Worship.

lender.name: Annelene
lender.loan_because: my vision is heaven on earth within my lifetime

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel it gives the people involved a chance to better their circumstances and at the same time it makes them accountable for the changes being brought about.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers talk and share resources with other computers.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people at a grassroots level, and this was reinforced by GVVSDS Prasad of Sarvodaya Mangala. Sarvodaya is a Gandhian peace organization in India with a universal outreach.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: Without loans, I wouldn't be in college. I appreciate the need for financing dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm majoring in biology, but I love all the sciences, even the softer social sciences like economics. ; )

lender.name: Claire Crisp
lender.loan_because: A Kiva account plus money to get started was a Christmas gift from my aunt

lender.name: Katherine
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am a student at Luther College in Decorah, IA. Next fall I will begin my career as a high school English teacher.

lender.name: Stefanos
lender.loan_because: someone has to
lender.occupational_info: I sell things

lender.name: Marie-Jo
lender.loan_because: - I'm looking forward to a better world where no one is exploited and everyone contributes within his/her abilities - Kiva is a good platform which makes the procedure seamless for everyone (or rather those who can read English, translations would be welcome...)

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: It feels good. I know that there are many people out there that need money more than I do.

lender.name: Avinash & Roma
lender.loan_because: we believe in economic responsibility as a mechanism for social justice.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: My mother, my family and I would like to honour my beloved brother and support the cause of which he was so passionate.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It is not just about sending money through a group and counting on the whole amount to be put to good use.....its about helping others help themselves. There are many times when I needed help. I didn't want charity but I did need help to get going again.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the paperwork behind running the business I work for.
